subject: Problemi conessione
description_text:
Salve ho una pedaliera sim racing pro pedals , ho formattato il PC adesso
quando l 'ho ricollegata alla centralina e messo l USB nel PC mi dice USB
interrotto errore 43 come potrei risolvere?

conversations.body_text: Hi Mohamed Zouari,  Please provide your order information and the pedal model you purchased. Also, note that the pedals need to be connected to a USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC and should not be used through a USB hub.

Sono pro pedals ordinato da Achille clemente

Hi Mohamed Zouari,  If your computer cannot operate properly, but the pedals work on a USB hub or another computer, please use the USB hub and follow the steps below to update the pedal firmware. This should resolve the issue.            First, please ensure you are using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. Also, connect only one SIMSONN control box at a time—do not connect multiple units simultaneously.    For Pro series control boxes: If the version is 1.7.1, you can update the firmware via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu (This method does not apply to 1.7.0 control boxes.)    For PlusX pedals: Only the plusx.sfu firmware can be used for updates.
